name: overwinter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I ] to spend the winter in a particular place: Beetles overwinter in leaf litter, tree crevices, and homes.
[ T ] to keep plants or animals in a particular place during the winter: Lift and overwinter the bulbs in a frost-free greenhouse. Their cattle are overwintered indoors.
[ T ] to continue to grow crops or plants during the winter: If you overwinter lettuce, don't expect the seedlings to grow quickly.
